Name: Sumiii
About the game: 'I wan't to live, and not to die.' ~ Sumiii Sumiii is a punishing swimming game, a homage to Jeremy Winterrowd's 2003 game 'The Maze', better and more fondly remembered as the 'Scary Maze Game'. Sumiii is also a remake of my first attempt at developing a game 'Crazy Aems game'. You can't move diagonal, and everything kills you. New and strange creatures await the squid capable of advancing to the next level. ▪ Between 1 and 3 hours of agonizing but chill gameplay. ▪ A cute closing animation and song for those able to complete the game. ▪ Listen to the tolls of death, over and over.
Meta Title: Sumiii: Oct 5, 2022, Alexander Erden and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Sumiii? Check out the release date (Oct 5, 2022), developer insights from Alexander Erden, and a complete game summary.
